org.dotplot.grid.ui
Class ConfigGridView

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.dotplot.ui.ConfigurationView
          org.dotplot.grid.ui.ConfigGridView

public class ConfigGridView
extends ConfigurationView

With the ConfigGridView the user can configure the grid settings. It seperates the configuration in Server Settings and Client Settings
